lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: What is this around my wrist?

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: I have given you a bracelet for you to combat the cyberthreats. I will explain our situation after we have exterminate them.

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: Defeat the enemies by playing cards from your hand! Cards require Energy to play. Once you are out, end your turn. At the start of your turn, new cards are drawn and your Energy is replenished.

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: This is your Energy. It displays the current and maximum energy you currently have.

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: Now, pick a card and drag it to the field to play. Remember to block incoming attacks, and strike when you have the chance!
